scripts.dev: pnpm build:all && concurrently "pnpm --filter supra-starkey-connect run build:watch" "pnpm --filter vanilla-example-app run dev" "pnpm --filter react-example-app run dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm build && pnpm --filter react-example-app run build
scripts.serve:all:prod: concurrently "pnpm --filter react-example-app run preview" "pnpm --filter vanilla-example-app run start"
